page.title: 13"Bomber" Graham - Career.
page.content: {How many fights have you won or lost?} Ha! Ha! You don't know much about me, do you? I've had 32 professional fights and I've won 32. {Have you ever been knocked out?} No, but I've been knocked down once because I wasn't looking. {How many hours do you train each day? I start off at 05.30 and go for a half hour run. When I get back I have a shower and then go back to bed until 11.00. At 16.30 after work, I train for 2 hours at the Plumpton Boy's Club. This is an old church in Wincobank which has been converted into a gym. Brendan Ingle is my trainer. {Will you ever stop boxing? Yes I will, as soon as I start getting hurt and cut.
